title: A speach, deliuered to the Kings most excellent Maiestie at his entrie into his good-towne of Edinburgh, vpon the xvi. of May, anno Domini 1617. In the name of the magistrates and citizens of the saide towne. By Master Iohn Hay, their clerke deputie.
author: Hay, John, Sir, 1578-1654.
notes: "Oratio per eundem Serenissimo Regi exhibita" begins on B3r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
